revised_title: Experiments on the Production of Dephlogisticated Air from Water with Various Substances
tldr: The author conducts experiments to produce dephlogisticated air from water using raw silk and various other substances. The experiments reveal that the air produced is of a higher quality than common air and even better than air produced by plants in similar experiments. The author also describes the process of using algebraic characters to determine the goodness of the air and the precautions taken during the experiments.
